page.shortlink: api objects security object administrative create user method
page.description: Adds a new user with a password.

prototypes.prototype: Context.Security.AdministrativeCreateUser as L (UserName as C, Password as C, IsApproved as L = .T.)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user is created; otherwise .F.

argument.name: UserName as C
argument.description: The name of the new user.

argument.name: Password as C
argument.description: The password for the new user.

argument.name: IsApproved as L
argument.description: Set the user to being approved for login or not approved for login. If this value is set to .F. the user will not be able to login even if the credentials are valid. Optional. Defaults to .T.

page.discussion: Context.Security.AdministrativeCreateUser() adds a new user with a password. This method can be used whether or not a password question and answer is required so its use should be limited to pages/code that require administrative access. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
